t: Amazon.com: Bakyarder
s: BAKYARDER revolves around integrating street elements from different cultures into mainstream fashion. These elements can be traced back to the founder's experiences during his travels in Asia, including skateboarding culture, graffiti art, hip-hop, and street dance.
